article_title: An Intersection At The End Of America
article_description: A portrait of Dilley  Texas  home of the largest immigration detention center in the United States
article_content: A portrait of Dilley  Texas  home of the largest immigration detention center in the United States Reporting for this piece was supported by the Pulitzer Center Dear Dying Town                The food is cheap  the squirrels are black  the box factories   66421 chars
